mean_en: used when you are saying goodbye to somebody late in the evening, or when they or you are going to bed; in informal use people often just say Night.
sentence: I miss the time when my mother would tell me "goodnight" at bedtime.
sentence_trans: 我怀念睡前妈妈对我说“晚安”的时光。
word_etyma: good好的 ＋ night晚上 → goodnight晚安；再见
